name: Time Crisis VR Training
description:
Hit the targets before time is up without dying. Targets can shoot (be careful with the golden targets).

Will you beat my record?

Controls (desktop)

  • Right mouse button (hold): Uncover
  • Right mouse button (release): Cover & Reload
  • Left mouse (hit): Shoot (if uncovered, does nothing else)
  • Exit game: ALT + F4

Controls (VR)

Only uses a single controller.

This build has been tested and configured for the Valve Index, using the right controller.

  • A button (hold): Uncover
  • A button  (release): Cover & Reload
  • Trigger (hit): Shoot (if uncovered, does nothing else)
  • Exit game: ALT + F4

Debug Commands:

  • F1: Enable/Disable debug interface
  • F2: Show/Hide targets' aiming lines
  • F5: Destroy all targets
  • F6: Enable/Disable invincibility
  • F7: Pause/Resume timer
  • F8: Enable/Disable infinite ammo
